Large sample (100,000+ rolls): stats approach expected values. Tiny sample (100 rolls): stats *will* vary widely from expected. A .3% difference is negligible.

Random doesn't mean exactly equal at all times. Random means stats approach expected over a large sample, but they'll never match exactly. Read about sample size & stats on Wikipedia.
